mapper.select: select * from text_book_info where id=#{id} and del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: insert into text_book_info ( id, name, image, creater, create_time, del_flag, unit_num, grade_id )values( #{id}, #{name}, #{image}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}, #{unitNum}, #{gradeId} )
mapper.update: update text_book_info set del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} where id=#{id}
